name: High Jumps Dart Car 3D
description:
High Jumps Dart Car 3D is for those people who love performing high level car stunts, fast driving with nitro, dangerous turns on stunt ramp and multiple asphalt hurdles. Extreme stunt challenge begins with and extra dose of amazing sports car nitro and GT racing car. It’s an ultimate survival driving test against all you odds with your extreme car driving skill.
Features
•Realistic car physics and smooth controls
•Amusing Visual and Sound Effects
•Eclectic Variety of Stunts cars
•Breathtaking Stunts Environment and 3D Graphics
•Realistic Animated Hurdles to cross
